name: The Last Dragon (Gary N.)
description:
You play as the last remaining dragon, your kind has been hunted to extinction a long time ago; you awake from your long hibernation to find that your domain has been overrun with humans! Burn down their town and show them your might! 

Credits

Sounds from https://freesound.org/ 

Shader from (Simple Toon) 

Tree assets from (The Illustrated Nature)

Background music from (Ultimate Game Music Collection)

Castle/Human Models from (Toony Tiny RTS Set)

Everything else (Scripts, 3D models, Animations, additional textures were self made @GameDevGary)
